name: Creamed Salmon on Toast
author: Jacque Helland
summary: A quick and easy snack or lite dinner of creamed salmon and peas. The sauce may be made as thin or thick as you like.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can canned green peas, drained, liquid reserved
directions: In a saucepan or skillet, melt butter over medium heat
Whisk in flour, stirring constantly, until a smooth paste is formed
Gradually add milk and reserved liquid from peas, stirring constantly, until a smooth thick gravy is formed
Flake salmon into a bowl, breaking apart any large pieces
Stir salmon and peas into the sauce carefully with a wooden spoon to avoid mashing the peas
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper
Toast bread in toaster oven or broiler pan
Butter, if desired, and top with salmon mixture
